t: The Privileges of Citizenship in Zion.
A Psalm of the sons of Korah. A Song.
His*pn foundation is in the holy mountains.
The*ln Lord*s loves the gates of Zion More*ln than all the other*i dwelling places of Jacob.
Glorious*ln things are spoken of you, O*ln city of God. Selah.
“I*ln shall mention Rahab and Babylon among those who know Me; Behold,*ln Philistia and Tyre with Ethiopia: ‘This*ln one was born there.’ ”
But*ln of Zion it shall be said, “This one and that one were born in her”; And*ln the Most High Himself will establish her.
The*ln Lord*s will count when He registers the peoples, “This*ln one was born there.” Selah.
Then*ln those who sing as well as those who play the flutes shall*i say,*i “All*ln my springs of*i joy*i are in you.”
